cern.colt.matrix.tdcomplex.algo

Class DenseDComplexAlgebra

  • java.lang.Object
    • cern.colt.PersistentObject
      • cern.colt.matrix.tdcomplex.algo.DenseDComplexAlgebra
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class DenseDComplexAlgebra
extends PersistentObject
    Linear algebraic matrix operations operating on dense complex matrices.
    Author:
    Wolfgang Hoschek (wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch), Piotr Wendykier (piotr.wendykier@gmail.com), Richard Lincoln (r.w.lincoln@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DenseDComplexAlgebra DEFAULT
      A default Algebra object; has DComplexProperty.DEFAULT attached for tolerance.
      static DenseDComplexAlgebra ZERO
      A default Algebra object; has DComplexProperty.ZERO attached for tolerance.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DenseDComplexAlgebra()
      Constructs a new instance with an equality tolerance given by Property.DEFAULT.tolerance().
      DenseDComplexAlgebra(double tolerance)
      Constructs a new instance with the given equality tolerance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double normInfinity(DComplexMatrix1D x)
      Returns the infinity norm of vector x, which is Max(abs(x[i])).
      void setProperty(DComplexProperty property)
      Attaches the given property object to this Algebra, defining tolerance.

      • Methods inherited from class cern.colt.PersistentObject

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT

        public static final DenseDComplexAlgebra DEFAULT
        A default Algebra object; has DComplexProperty.DEFAULT attached for tolerance. Allows ommiting to construct an Algebra object time and again. Note that this Algebra object is immutable. Any attempt to assign a new Property object to it (via method setProperty), or to alter the tolerance of its property object (via property().setTolerance(...)) will throw an exception.

      • ZERO

        public static final DenseDComplexAlgebra ZERO
        A default Algebra object; has DComplexProperty.ZERO attached for tolerance. Allows ommiting to construct an Algebra object time and again. Note that this Algebra object is immutable. Any attempt to assign a new Property object to it (via method setProperty), or to alter the tolerance of its property object (via property().setTolerance(...)) will throw an exception.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DenseDComplexAlgebra

        public DenseDComplexAlgebra()
        Constructs a new instance with an equality tolerance given by Property.DEFAULT.tolerance().

      • DenseDComplexAlgebra

        public DenseDComplexAlgebra(double tolerance)
        Constructs a new instance with the given equality tolerance.
        Parameters:
        tolerance - the tolerance to be used for equality operations.

    • Method Detail

      • setProperty

        public void setProperty(DComplexProperty property)
        Attaches the given property object to this Algebra, defining tolerance.
        Parameters:
        property - the Property object to be attached.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this==DEFAULT && property!=this.property() - The DEFAULT Algebra object is immutable.
        UnsupportedOperationException - if this==ZERO && property!=this.property() - The ZERO Algebra object is immutable.
        See Also:
        property

      • normInfinity

        public double normInfinity(DComplexMatrix1D x)
        Returns the infinity norm of vector x, which is Max(abs(x[i])).
